job.title: SAP ABAP Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Hospital & Health Care
job.description:
Cerebral Staffing, LLC is seeking a SAP ABAP Software Engineer to work at our direct client John Deere in Moline, IL.      SAP ABAP with focus on FICO and Sales & Distribution (SD)      Required Skills:     - 5+ years of experience in developing using core SAP ABAP. This includes using OOP and all SAP enhancement techniques   
  - 2+ years of experience in HANA data modeling using Hana Studio. This includes creating and maintaining attribute, analytic and calculation views   
  - 2+ years of experience in development using Fiori/UI5   
  - 2+ years of experience working with IDocs, Proxies, and Webservices   
  - 2+ years of experience in developing in Gateway, and OData technologies   
  - 2+ years of functional and technical experience in FICO and SD modules         
Desired Skills/Experience     - 1+ years of experience configuring, developing, and/or troubleshooting PI interfaces   
  - 1+ years of functional and technical experience the following core SAP modules SD, FICO and MM.   
  - 1+ years of experience in cloud development with platforms like AWS, Azure, SAP Cloud Platform   
  - 1+ years of experience working with agile software design methodology for development and documentation      
Cerebral Staffing offers health/vision/dental insurance, Paid Holiday/PTO short-time disability, 401k and paid life insurance      Powered by JazzHR      jNaIdRZsdV
